fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Embezzle and use a deposited ability (3 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-This role cannot spawn without Crime Doer (2906)
-This is not a playable role. The host must control this role and spawn a player named “THE BANK”
-You are a valid target
-You cannot be hung
-You cannot speak in day chat, whisper/be whispered to, or vote
-You cannot be roleblocked
-If the Crime Doer attempts to deposit more than 3 abilities to you, attack them with an Overkill attack
-If the host loses as this role, their spot in the queue is removed and is able to be taken. They may re-fill this spot
-If any bank related roles other than Crime Doer spawn, they may reside in the bank once for an Overprotective defense, while also roleblocking them

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill a player, then protect another successfully
